summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of Afroboost application completed. Most features working correctly including white SVG icons, neon borders, coach dashboard, promo code validation, and real-time price updates. Minor visual feedback issue with promo code field border color.

ui_bugs.issue: Promo code field does not show green border when valid code is entered
ui_bugs.details: Field border remains purple (#d91cd2) instead of turning green for valid codes. Functionality works (price updates) but visual feedback missing.

ui_bugs.issue: Course card selection state not clearly visible
ui_bugs.details: Course card doesn't show clear 'selected' class when clicked, though date selection works correctly.

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix promo code field visual feedback: implement green border (border-color: #22c55e) when valid promo code is entered. The validation logic works correctly but the CSS styling for valid state is missing.
